string.value: I received #b#t04001110##k in the basement of the Ludibrium Castle. A letter with no name. I wonder who sent it... Let's go to the Cloudy Balcony, maybe there'll be some answers there...

When I got to Cloud Balcony, I was forcifully transported to somewhere. The man there seemed like a familiar thief I had seen before. But I couldn't put my finger on who he has exactly....He just demanded me to bring him #b#t04031456##k. Who is this guy? Why is he telling me to do this? I feel like I should go up to the rooftop of Guild Headquarters where I can get a maple marble.... \n\n#i04031456##t04031456# #b#c04031456#/1#k
How foolish of you to come to this place! You didn't even suspect a trap! You know you aren't good enough yet to survive! \n\r#L0# #b What do you mean?#k

You know the maple leaves on the rooftop of Guild HQ? When it shines, you have to put the marbles there. Then you can put maple leaves into the marbles. Bring them to me! \n\r#L0# #bWhy do I have to do this?#k
Because I'm the one who can give you what you want. You don't seem to understand. Are you willing to do what I asked of you?
I thought so. I'm the only one who can give you what you want. Come back with #b#t04031456##k. You'll get #t4031456# if you follow the method I previously described. I'll wait for you here.
Are you refusing to listen to me? Then you can't get what you want!
You got the Maple Marble... much better than I thought. \n\r#L0# #bNow tell me why you asked me to get it.#k
I told you I would give anything you want. \n\r#L0# #bWhat are you going to give me?#k
A new skill. That's what you really want isn't it?
If you want it, talk to me again. I don't know why Hellin has such faith in you, but I'm willing to find out.
You couldn't get #b#t04031456##k? Why does #p2081400##k hold you in such high regard?
You lost #b#t4031476##k? You should've been careful. Shame on you. I'll give you one more chance. Make sure you succeed!
